column5: Yup, Murphy's law struck today.  Thought about the boat plug when leaving home, one the way (5 times) and at the launch.  Unfortunatley, at the launch was after the boat was in the water and we were loaded to drive away.  Better late then never I guess.  Couple questions.  How do you clean the carpet and will my boat batter charger dry out?
That would be my battery inverter
Been there done that!  Open all of your storage compartments and everything will dry out better. I like to use the spray foam automotive carpet and upholstery cleaner for my boat carpet.
So how much water did you take on?  I think you'd be hard pressed to find someone here who hasn't done that or left the lights plugged in or forgot the net or....

Yup - done it once during my first year with the boat - sitting at fishermans pier under the skyway - star the boat up and my daughter says   Daddy - why is there water coming out of the motor???   Gotta do it once to remember always
Ditto except i was swearing like a madman...
No plug problems for me on the maiden voyage... 1 in the hole and 2 in the toolbox. I did however forget the paddles at home!
